term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - daughter product in radiochemistry
term.title: daughter product

item.text: Any nuclide which follows a specified radionuclide in a decay chain.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 2513. 'Nomenclature for radioanalytical chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 2517 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466122513)
